name: Intergalactic
description:
Intergalactic is a VR game centered in the setting of space.
You can explore a range of levels with big enemy ships,
black holes, asteroid fields, and more!



You fly through space in a ship with a fully interactable,
working futuristic HUD. Fly through the levels and destroy randomly spawning ships,
minibosses, and asteroids. This game features a semi realistic
graphics design with low poly models.



Defeating these ships will sometimes spawn gears that you can
collect and use at the shop in the main menu to upgrade and improve your ship.
There is also a 5-mission campaign where you raid a huge enemy
ship and destroy it. The game comes with many QOL features
such as a standing mode and setting to make the game more
comfortable for players who may experience VR sickness.
